title._content: Image taken from page 7 of 'The West Virginia Hand-book and Immigrant's Guide. A sketch of the state of West Virginia ... with a brief notice of each county and an official state directory and map'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The West Virginia Hand-book and Immigrant's Guide. A sketch of the state of West Virginia ... with a brief notice of each county and an official state directory and map" Author: DEBAR, J. H. Diss. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10408.cc.16." Page: 7 Place of Publishing: Parkersburg Date of Publishing: 1870 Publisher: Gibbens Bros Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000887529 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
